1#pragma once
2#include "Export.hpp"
3
4#include <QtCore/QUuid>
5#include <QtWidgets/QGraphicsObject>
6class QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent;
7namespace QtNodes
8{
9 class FlowScene;
10 class Connection;
11 class ConnectionGeometry;
12 class Node;
13 /// Graphic Object for connection. Adds itself to scene
14 class NODE_EDITOR_PUBLIC ConnectionGraphicsObject : public QGraphicsObject
15 {
16 Q_OBJECT
17 public:
18 ConnectionGraphicsObject(FlowScene &scene, Connection &connection);
19 virtual ~ConnectionGraphicsObject();
20 enum
21 {
22 Type = UserType + 2
23 };
24 int type() const override
25 {
26 return Type;
27 }
28
29 public:
30 Connection &connection();
31 QRectF boundingRect() const override;
32 QPainterPath shape() const override;
33 void setGeometryChanged();
34 /// Updates the position of both ends
35 void move();
36 void lock(bool locked);
37
38 protected:
39 void paint(QPainter *painter, QStyleOptionGraphicsItem const *option, QWidget *widget = 0) override;
40 void mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event) override;
41 void mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event) override;
42 void mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event) override;
43 void hoverEnterEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event) override;
44 void hoverLeaveEvent(QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent *event) override;
45
46 private:
47 void addGraphicsEffect();
48
49 private:
50 FlowScene &_scene;
51 Connection &_connection;
52 };
53} // namespace QtNodes
